```{python}
#| echo: false
import hcc as hcc
from itables import init_notebook_mode, show
init_notebook_mode(all_interactive=True)

```

## Times of sunrise and sunset

```{python}
hcc.sunrise_times()
```


## River conditions

```{python}
import hcc
df = hcc.scrape_conditions()
show(df,  search={"search": "Local"})
```


## Flow rate at Kingston

```{python}
hcc.plot_thames_level("Kingston", parameter = "flow")
```

## Water level at Molesey Lock

```{python}
hcc.plot_thames_level("Molesey Lock")
```

## River closures

```{python}
df = hcc.scrape_river_closures()
show(df,  search={"search": "Local"})
```
